1.「お集まりの 皆さまぁ～っ！ 記念すべき| 第１０回 アストルティア・ナイト|: Laaadies and gentlemen! I'd now like to|introduce you to the contestants of the 10th|Astoltia Knight Contest!

2.「前大会で 好成績をおさめ | 見事 出場権を獲得した ３名に加えて～……: And now, joining the 3 winners from|last year's tournament...

3.「ファルパパ神による特別推薦枠 ２名と！| 総勢４８人の予選を 勝ち抜いた３名っ: We've got 2 special recommendations from|Falpapa himself, as well as 3 winners from 48|contestants! 8 hotcakes will battle it out!

4.「まずは 前大会の覇者の 入場だぁっ！| 苦節９年！ キュートの代名詞たる プリ: First up, we have last year's winner, 9 years|in the making! Will this prince, the epitome|of cute, defend his title?!

5.「見た目はキュート！ 生い立ちハード！| 酸いも甘いも かみ分けまくりの| メギ: Cute on the outside, but stern on the inside!|The heir to Megistris who is both sweet and|sour... Prince Raguas!

6.「ようこそ ホワイトショコラ城へ！| 前回の アストルティア・ナイトである ぼく: Welcome to the castle, everyone! As the|previous Astoltia Knight, I, Raguas, would|like to extend a warm welcome.

7.「……と 堅苦しい あいさつは ここまでです。| ぼくたち 今年も とびっきりの: ...Sorry, but that's all for the formalities.|We've made some really wonderful sweets this|year with much love and care!

8.「よかったら ぼくの クッキーを| 一番最初に 味見しにきて くださいねっ。|: I hope you'll be the first to taste my|special cookies. Hehe... it's a promise!

9.「さぁっ！ 準ナイトの おでましだぁ～っ！！| クールなフェイスに 熱きハートの: Now! Here comes our junior knight! The cool|faced, hot blooded, amphibious Weddie hunk|we all know and love!

10.「上位常連である 歴戦の実力者は| 今年こそ ナイトの座を 奪還できるか！？|: Can this top ranker reclaim his title this|year?! The lone swordsman who appears|and disappears as he pleases! Hyuza!

11.「前回は 長年のライバル ラグアス王子が| アストルティア・ナイトになって| オ: Last time, my long time rival Raguas finally|became an Astoltia Knight. Congrats on your|win... I was happy to see it.

12.「……だが ここからは 真剣勝負だ。: But now... it's time to get serious.

13.「記念すべき 第１０回 アストルティア・ナイト| ……その称号に ふさわしいのは: The title of 10th Astoltia Knight is sure to|be a memorable one... so I think I'm the only|one worthy. You all think so too, right?

14.「はっはっは！| たいした自信だが そう簡単には いかせない。: Hahaha! Quite the confident one you are,|but I won't let you off that easy.

15.「おお～っと！？| ここで！ 前回３位の この男が| またまた今年も 妙なトコか: What do we have here?! The man who placed|third last year barges in again from who knows|where!

16.「不敵な笑顔と 紅蓮の髪！| キケンな香りに しもべ志願が １００人待ち！| 目: With a daring smile and hair as red as fire! A|dangerous scent that has 100 hopeful servants|waiting! Aiming for the title of Knight!

17.「五種族 竜族 魔族に天使 全員まとめて| メロッメロに しちまいな～っ！！|: Melting the hearts of the five races, dragons,|demons, and angels alike! The Demon World's|bold soldier of fortune, Yushka!

18.「副官が ナイトに なってるってのに| 俺が ふがいないままじゃ 魔界の連中に|: My second-in-command has been knighted... so|if I lose here, the Demon World will ridicule|me. This year, it's all out serious mode!

19.「……来いよ。| 俺と クッキーの契約を 結ぼう。: Come here... let us make a cookie pact.

20.「あなたの覚悟 しかと 受け止めました。| ……ならば 私も| 全力で お相手い: I can feel your strong determination|this time. Very well... I shall also be your|opponent!

21.「挑戦するは 予選上位の この男～っ！| 今年の運命の女神は ニコイチ主従の|: This challenger ranked high in the prelims!|Which man of this dynamic master-servant duo|will the goddess of fate smile upon?!

22.「おカタい副官の 甘いささやきが 聞けるのは| ナイトコンテスト限定の レアもん: Hearing sweet whispers from this stubborn|servant is music to your ears, isn't it? The|one-eyed wonder... Nazine!

23.「アストルティアの みなさん。| 今年も お招きにあずかり 感謝する。: Ladies and gentlemen of Astoltia... thank you|for your invitation again this year.

24.「さあ ふたたび 我が手を取りたまえ。| 魔界と アストルティア ふたつの世界の: Take my hand once more. Let us embrace the|cooperation between Astoltia and the Demon|World...

25.「まだまだ 予選突破の猛者は 続くぜぇ～っ！| お次は みんな お待ちかねっ！: The fierce preliminary competitors keep|coming! And now, the moment everyone's been|waiting for! Next we have...!

26.「瞳の真実 ゴーグルに隠し～っ！| 探究するは 奇跡の秘宝か 永遠の愛か！？|: Concealing the truth behind those goggles!|Will he find treasure or true love?! The|exceptional explorer, Raul!

27.「……みな いい面構えをしているな。| 相手にとって 不足はない。: Everyone here has a good look about them...|There's no shortage of fierce opponents.

28.「俺は 今一度 ナイトの座に挑む！| 応援してくれた 皆のために……| いや 言: I once again aim for the title of Knight! To|everyone who's supported me... No. That's just|an excuse. I'm doing this for myself.

29.「失ってしまった 大切なものを| なんとしても 取り戻したいんだ……。| どうか: There is something that I lost that I must|reclaim... Everyone, please lend me your|strength!

30.「予選を突破した参加者 ラストは| おひさしぶりの コイツの登場だぁ～っ！！: The last of our qualifiers is a guy who we|haven't seen in quite some time!

31.「頭脳で勝負なら 優勝確実！| ナイトコンテスト攻略計画は 長き眠りの間に| た: If it's a battle of wits, he's sure to win!|He's had a long time sleeping to plan his|strategy, with a lot of tricks up his sleeve!

32.「マッドなパパと スイートなママ♪ の| 愛の結晶は 栄光を つかめるのか～っ！: With a crazy father and sweet mother... will|the fruits of true love find glory?! The|prophesized prognosticator, Pukulas!

33.「この 楽しい催しに また参加できるなんて| すごく光栄だよ！ みんな ボクのこ: I'm honored to be able to participate in such|a fun event again. Thank you, everyone, for|continuing to support me.

34.「この日のために 食べると 幸福になれる| おいしいクッキーの レシピを| 編み: I've created a special recipe for delicious|cookies that bring happiness when eaten, all|for this special day.

35.「ボクの クッキーで| みんなも おいしさ新発見♪ してほしいな。| それじゃあ: I want everyone to have a new, delicious|discovery with my cookies. I hope that you'll|try them!

36.「予選上位組は ここまで！| さあさあ お次は ファルパパちゃんによる| 特別推: And those are all the top qualifiers! Next,|I'd like to introduce the two specially|recommended by Falpapa!

37.「デコっぱちも ズッ友も コイツが元祖！| なのに まさかの 初登場！？| 初期: With the flashy decorations and the best of|friends, this guy's the original! And yet,|it's his first time?! Let's take a look back!

38.「もう あの頃の 子供じゃないっ！| 破邪舟師のウデも ボディも 鍛えてきたじぇ: He's no kid anymore! Training his skills as a|Ship Shaper and his body alike! The 500 year|old friend, Erju!

39.「ここで お菓子を配ることが| アストルティアの平和に つながるって| 師に 説: My master told me that giving out sweets here|could lead to peace in Astoltia, but... is|that really true?

40.「……まあいい。これも 修行の一環だ。| やると決めたからには| 全力で やりと: But, it's fine. This is part of my training,|so I will do everything in my power to|see it through to the end!

41.「来い！ ボクの クッキーは| 逃げも隠れも しないぞ！| すべての種族の かけ: Come on! My cookies won't run nor hide! I'll|be the bridge that connects all races!

42.「ラストは 特別推薦枠２人目の コイツだぁっ！| まばたき厳禁！ 最後の参加者の: And last but not least, the second of our|recommendations! Don't blink! You don't want|to miss our final contestant!

43.「勇者と盟友の伝説は ここから 始まったぁ！| どんな 過酷な運命だって| 勇者: The legend of the Hero and their ally began|here! No matter how harsh the fate, the power|of the Hero can overcome it!

44.「大魔王には めっぽう強いが| 盟友にゃ弱い おひとよし～っ！！| 光と影の初代: Strong against the Great Demon King, but not|so much against his sworn ally! The first|Hero of light and shadow, Ashley!

45.「なんだよ……レオの奴 来てねぇのか？| ちょっとぐらい 兄ちゃんを 応援してく: Really...? Leo still isn't here? I didn't|think it'd be such a hassle to cheer on your|brother even just a little bit...

46.「おっと すまねぇな。| ハイカラな祭りに 招いてくれて ありがとよ！| 俺が: Oops, sorry. Thanks for inviting me to such a|fantastic festival! I'm the first Hero, as|they say.

47.「勝負ってのは 勝たなきゃ 意味がねぇ！| 当然 ナイトの座を 狙ってくつもりだ: Winning means everything in the heat of|battle! I'll definitely win the title of Knight|this year! You'll see what a Hero can do!

48.「以上っ！ ８名の 個性豊かな参加者たちが| アストルティア・ナイトの座をかけて: And that's it! These eight unique participants|will duke it out for the coveted throne of|the Astoltia Knight!

49.「栄光の座に かがやくのは 誰か……| それを決めるのは！| こ・こ・に・い・る: Who will be crowned with glory...? It's up to|you to decide! All! Of! You!

50.「さ～て どう？ どう？ <pc>。 | ちょー スゴいヤツらが 大集合だけど|: Well? Well? There are so many amazing choices|this year, but which one is your honest|favorite?

51.「アストルティア・ナイトに ふさわしいと思う | 参加者を選んだら| キミの 清: When you've made your choice of who you think|is worthy, make sure to cast your vote!

52.「投票は 私の カワイイ妹っ！| 集計係モカの所で 受け付けてるからね！: Give your votes to my cute sister, Mocha!

53.「ナイトに 投票し終わったら| 話すことがあるから メリルの所に 来るべし！|: After you've chosen your votes, come see me!|I'll be waiting for you outside, I promise!

54.「じゃじゃーん！ 記念すべき| 第１０回 アストルティア・ナイト| コンテストの: Ta-dah! I will now announce the results of|the 10th Astoltia Knight Contest!

55.「さあさあ！ ホワイトショコラ城の| ナイトの座は 誰の手に！？| 耳の穴かっぽ: Come, now! Who will be the Knight of the|White Chocolate Castle? Clear your ears and|listen well!

56.「いっくよ～！| みんなっ ステージに 注目するべし～っ！！: Here we go! Everyone, please watch the stage!
